data.name: Barricade
data.detailed_description:
In this Co-op Survival Retro FPS game, 1-4 players must work together to defend against waves of zombies. Your only chance of survival is to build a makeshift barricade with the items around you. Using your arsenal, build, shoot, repair, and upgrade to survive in this retro FPS.

Buy ammo, guns, and upgrades between rounds to increase your chances of survival.

With over 20 different props, there is no limit to how you design your barricade.
data.about_the_game:
In this Co-op Survival Retro FPS game, 1-4 players must work together to defend against waves of zombies. Your only chance of survival is to build a makeshift barricade with the items around you. Using your arsenal, build, shoot, repair, and upgrade to survive in this retro FPS.

Buy ammo, guns, and upgrades between rounds to increase your chances of survival.

With over 20 different props, there is no limit to how you design your barricade.
data.short_description: Build, shoot, repair, upgrade! 1-4 players build and defend a barricade from waves of zombies that will tear through your barricade to devour you in this retro FPS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
